General.Name: Asia Metal Public Company Limited
General.Description: Asia Metal Public Company Limited engages in manufacturing and trading processed steel products in Thailand. It offers hot-rolled, pickled and oiled, and cold-rolled products to steel wholesalers and end user factories; and round, square, and rectangular steel pipes, as well as light lips channels. The company also trades in round-bars and deformed-bars, as well as square and round steel tubes. In addition, it provides steel cutting and modifying services. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.
General.Address: 55, 55/1 Moo 2 Soi Watnamdaeng, Bang Phli, Thailand, 10540
